item.description:
Talk Cinema, February 17, is an opportunity to participate in a unique Independent Film experience at the iconic Coolidge Corner Theater in Brookline.  Our Meetup Group has the opportunity to attend, free of charge, the showing of Lore.

Last Sunday's Talk Cinema was cancelled due to Blizzard, 2013.

As an encore, Nemo brings:


Winter Storm Plato: Snow, Wind Headed for New England



Weekend Snow for the East



Winter Storm Plato will deliver snow and strong winds to New England on Sunday.


Sunday's Forecast:

Across far eastern New England, we are forecasting accumulations of 3 to 8 inches in some of the areas hit hard by Winter Storm Nemo around a week ago. This includes the Bostonmetro area. Cape Cod may see as much as 6 to 10 inches of snow.

The snow in New England will also be accompanied by very strong winds on Sunday, possibly gusting as high as 40 or 50 mph. The combination of snow and wind will result in poor visibility for a time on Sunday.

Please know that tomorrow is not the usual Meetup with International/Arthouse.  Enjoy tomorrow's Free Talk Cinema.

And, we'll See You at the Movies,

John
item.how_to_find_us: John will be sitting in the front row balcony, right hand side facing the screen.
item.name: Talk Cinema
